document_data.name: Cappa Delourese
document_data.mainbody:
'''Cappa Delourese''' was a woman of means and a client of [[Sorcerous Sundries]] in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''My advice? Cobble together what you can from what's left and wait for this all to blow over.''|Cappa Delourese}}
document_data.Description: Alice was a [[wood elven]] woman with woody-green skin and blur eyes. She head a head of bright red hair and was dressed in [[jerkin]] of fine quality.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Cappa Delourese was trying to collect supples to get her through the tumult of the [[Cult of the Absolute]] and its march on the city of Baldur's Gate. She was looking to purchase some mage's supplies at Sorcerous Sundries even though many of the city's store were running low on goods.
